channel.title: Anyone know how to remove MYSQ from the source so it can run?
channel.description:
I got innovation x and it says this when i run it..
[SHUTDOWN HOOKS]: Sucessfully started. Cannot find mySql Driver. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 42ms. Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/highscores Unable to connect to MySQL [SHUTDOWN HOOKS]: Sucessfully started. Cannot find mySql Driver. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 40ms. Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/highscores Unable to connect to MySQL [SHUTDOWN HOOKS]: Sucessfully started. Cannot find mySql Driver. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 53ms. Cannot find mySql Driver. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 44ms. Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/highscores Unable to connect to MySQL [SHUTDOWN HOOKS]: Sucessfully started. Cannot find mySql Driver. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 44ms. Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/highscores Unable to connect to MySQL [SHUTDOWN HOOKS]: Sucessfully started. Cannot find mySql Driver. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 24ms. Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/highscores Unable to connect to MySQL [SHUTDOWN HOOKS]: Sucessfully started. Cannot find mySql Driver. Cannot find mySql Driver. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 42ms. Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/highscores Unable to connect to MySQL [SHUTDOWN HOOKS]: Sucessfully started. Cannot find mySql Driver. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 40ms. Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/highscores Unable to connect to MySQL [SHUTDOWN HOOKS]: Sucessfully started. Cannot find mySql Driver. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 39ms. Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/highscores Unable to connect to MySQL [SHUTDOWN HOOKS]: Sucessfully started. Cannot find mySql Driver. [SERVER]: Loaded maps in 43ms. Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/highscores Unable to connect to MySQL [SHUTDOWN HOOKS]: Sucessfully started. Cannot find mySql Driver.
can someone tell me how to fix this i would really appreciate it thanks
